Subject: Basic Authentication with H3 and HTTPS?

Content-Type: TEXT/PLAIN; charset=UTF-8; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8BIT


Hello,

One site that we crawl regularly changed recently from HTTP to HTTPS. It 
is using basic authentication. We never had problems with 
org.archive.modules.credential.HttpAuthenticationCredential that we use in 
our crawler-beans.cxml. But this access seems to not work anymore with 
HTTPS.

Does anyone know how to solve this problem?

Bert
--
Biblioth√®que nationale de France
